website_summaries.verdict: It's durable and can sand anything. It's only flaw is a suspect dust bag, but that is a small compromise. Hands down the best on the market.
pros: Tops the charts in terms of versatility
Sander is weighted well and feels sturdy
Can sand a floor, strip a cabinet, or polish a knick-knack with equal ease
cons: Dust bag is poorly located and often fails
Tends to heat up, but not overheat

customer_reviews.title: awesome. I shopped around for a long time looking ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the big dog, awesome. I shopped around for a long time looking for a 4" sander. It is heavy and very powerful. I use it with the shopvac so no problems with dustbag. Had to make adapter for the hose as the discharge port is larger than my PC orbital sander or PC biscuit cutter. The dustbag is cheap, but everything else is high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Doghead

customer_reviews.title: Better than before!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4x24 Rockwell (pre Porter Cable days) and have used it for almost 25 years. After replacing a few switches, cords and drag pates it finally is time to retire it. I love this new version! Its balanced about the same as my old sander and with a 12 amps has plenty of power. This sander is simple and easy to use, and because of the large size can handle large projects with ease.
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but....
customer_reviews.text: Very good power sander. Really the only show in town if you want power and variable speed. Tracking is very consistent once adjusted. The only drawback is that the dust bag leaks badly at the junction with the sander, even with the clip solidly in place. It blows dust all over the shop. Somewhat improved after I put duct tape over part of the leaky area, but can't prevent all leakage. However, the sander does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: California Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. It worked great on several projects, but it is a little heavy for doing the bottom of doors. I had new carpeting installed, and needed to shave a little off the bottom of several doors. It did the job, but as I said, it is a little heavy for doing that sort of things. The belt is very easy to change, and the tracjing adjustment works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BASIC NO FRILLS BEEFY BELT SANDER
customer_reviews.text: One BEEFY Belt Sander. Took about a fourth of the time that my old worn out 3 inch needed. Easy to replace belts. Blows dust in your eyes if you don't look out e.g. peek over the top. Weird dust collection size won't fit any of my dust THREE collectors. Sears on the wall, Jet four inch wall system, and roll around craftsman wet/dry vacuum. Needs to ship with SOME kind of dust fitting? Still wouldn't send it back, maybe will use tape to connect to my vacuum system:)
customer_reviews.author: Okie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: OK, but only for specific jobs
customer_reviews.text: The unit is good, quite heavy. Seems a bit lacking in power: can struggle a bit even with only the weight of the tool. Unfortunately, did not work well on the deck I bought it for. The 5/4 decking boards usually cup a bit as they dry, which prevents this tool from doing its job. Still had to use an orbital sander and plain old hand sanding to complete the job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dead nuts reliable.  What's more important than that?
customer_reviews.text: Best 4" sander on the market, according to multiple reviews. Who am I to argue with that? This is my second PC 362V, and if it wears out after 17 years like the last one, then i will consider it the bargain to end all bargains.
customer_reviews.author: RealCaliforniaCowboy

customer_reviews.title: No Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Broke a month after buying it. Sparks flew out of motor vent and ran at a snail's pace. Contacted seller for repair or replacement. Seller never answered. Defects I can understand. Ignoring customers I cannot. It wouldn't hurt for Amazon to apply some pressure. They have real leverage, and these things do reflect on them also...
customer_reviews.author: F. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belt sander
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The variable speed enabled me to really control how much wood I removed. The dust collection was decent too. Although, as the bag fills it sprays material from where the bag has a split seam at the attachment point.
customer_reviews.author: John Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: heavy but the 4 inche is the only way to go
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Dust bag doesn’t seal at attachment point.
customer_reviews.text: Dust bag does not fit tight around attachment ring thus blows dust out top.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nikkel

customer_reviews.title: replaced an old Ryobi, after many years of wishing ...
customer_reviews.text: replaced an old Ryobi, after many years of wishing I had the PC, very heavy duty, expect it will deliver for many years more
customer_reviews.author: R. Misdom

customer_reviews.title: company said to bad, machine it self perfect
customer_reviews.text: less then 10 hours variable speed gone, company said to bad, machine it self perfect, but so what, 10 F%*# HOURS
customer_reviews.author: paul marino

customer_reviews.title: What is there not to love about this BEAST of a sander
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to love about this BEAST of a sander? I've been in the woodworking business for decades and this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: DZunner

customer_reviews.title: Great sander
customer_reviews.text: This cuts the work time in half compared to a light weight sander that you have to apply a lot of hand pressure to. Less gouging and more even without the muscle strain. Just guide it to where you need it and it does the work for you.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY L. FUSS

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the home
customer_reviews.text: There is not much you can't do with this sander. All the power you ever want and in a nice size package for working in the home. Refinished a hardwood floor with no issues - layer and layers of finish just came right off and it never stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few uses to get used to the additional mass but does an outstanding job surfacing large areas
customer_reviews.author: RobertW

customer_reviews.title: Good for deck floor sanding
customer_reviews.text: This is much heavier than the competitions and good for sanding floor on the deck. I cannot afford expensive floor sanders and I wanted one sander which double as floor sander. This is my perfect compromise. Strong built and very steady due to its weight, I have short work of sanding my 30foot by 30 foot deck.
customer_reviews.author: 442 Ojisan

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable is the best sander I've used
customer_reviews.text: Porter Cable is the best sander I've used. The belt tracking is true and does not require frequent adjustments which means no shredded belts. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miloslav Hojer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this sander to any woodworker. Very stable base and the variable speed is a great feature for fine sanding. Lots of power. The dust collection does clog easily but quickly remedied with an air sprayer. Tracking of the belt is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: William Lutes

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of machinery
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sander that i ever owned. It is far superior that others. It does not take much effort to flatten joined pieces of hardwood. Great job Porter Cable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tramonte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Hang on to it, especially with low grits, or it will drag you across your work bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Works as it should and is much faster than other types of hand sanders.
customer_reviews.author: B K

customer_reviews.title: Works Great BUT the dust bag connection leaks and spreads dust ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great BUT the dust bag connection leaks and spreads dust all over my garage which is both a health hazard and a fire hazard with my propane garage heater.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Erbach

customer_reviews.title: ... had it evaluated by a cabinet maker and he loved it. I only use it occasionally
customer_reviews.text: I had it evaluated by a cabinet maker and he loved it. I only use it occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: john & nancy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but a Horse
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy, which helps with my projects using hardwoods. Be care using this machine on softer woods by turning down the rotation speed - great feature. Also it gets very hot to my surprise after using it throughout the day with moderate frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Farber

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to use
customer_reviews.text: Definitely large, but I was expecting that. Easy enough to use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C

customer_reviews.title: Has only used it once but was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. Has only used it once but was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, well-built machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well-built machine. Tracks well and has plenty of power and weight for heavy sanding jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these because we have multiple homes. This is one of the best hand held belt sanders to buy. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker401

customer_reviews.title: Great brand - great product
customer_reviews.text: Great brand - great product. This will be used as a backup tool as I had new brushes repaired on older model. Nothing like first generation tools but this is a great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: works well. Reducer altered to fasten with a hose ...
customer_reviews.text: works well. Reducer altered to fasten with a hose clamp made hook up to 2 1/2 shop vac hose eliminate practically all dust.
customer_reviews.author: jack k.

customer_reviews.title: So far I have used the belt sander and only ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used the belt sander and only the 120 grit belt. This sander exceeds my previous belt sander (Craftsman) by miles. This was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: pro so far
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, and well balanced. I've used it for about 2 hours - needs months for really accurate eval, but so far, it is living up to my expectations from PC.
customer_reviews.author: woodbutcher

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable 4" wide Sander
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sander. A little on the heavy side. Built well
customer_reviews.author: Dean A. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: surprise the new design works as good as the old
customer_reviews.text: The balance is consistent with all belts,already put 200 hours sanding walnut tables. Bottom plate seems to be wearing OUT quickly.Hope the replacemnts are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH CADIEUX

customer_reviews.title: Powerful.  Be careful
customer_reviews.text: This belt sander is very well built, and is heavy enough to be effective, and light enough to work with for extended periods of time. It will remove material fast so use caution. It also arrived very securely packaged, and I am pleased with the features, especially the front and rear handles which are comfortable to grip and give good control over the movement. I don't know what to think about the bag.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sander. Balanced and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sander. Balanced and very easy to use. Enjoy the adjustable belt speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good sander. lots of power. Amazon customer service is great
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Powerful w/ great dust collection
customer_reviews.text: Powerful unit but easy to control. Best dust collection of any sander I've ever used. Easy to change belts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly powerful
customer_reviews.text: A truly powerful machine that can do some damage if you are not extremely careful. Also, put the power cord over you shoulder when using as I got the power cord hung up in the back wheel and could not get it out. Ihad to bring it to a service center over an hour away. They did not charge me to install a new cord but it was a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Maro Daro

customer_reviews.title: great tool don't know why I waited so long
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 30 year old craftsman, great tool don't know why I waited so long. Shipping was very timely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roll Model
customer_reviews.text: This is how sanders are supposed to work! Lots of HP, good weight, tracks straight, flush sanding, good dust collection, moderate noise and it never gets tired. Buy it if you are man or woman enough to hang on!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno H

customer_reviews.title: Porter-Cable 362V 4x24 Variable Speed Belt Sander
customer_reviews.text: Had one before then had to sell it. I really liked it so I bought a brand new one and love it!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: A good machine for fast material removal on a level work surface.
customer_reviews.text: I've only use this machine one time and it did a good job, but was a bit ungainly trying to sand things shoulder height and higher. Dust collection was average at best. Part of that problem was the clip that holds the bag in place allowed dust to escape through the split of fabric that allows the clip to extend outside so the operator can remove the bag and reinstall it. The machine is a bit heavier than I like for the reason stated above.
customer_reviews.author: book club reader

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable sander
customer_reviews.text: I own a 3 X 21 Craftsman sander, however I needed a bigger sander for a larger job. I bought it and it worked really good. The variable speed is a plus and changing the belts is easy to do. I would recommend this sander to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: daniel rabinovich

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved the "heft" of these sanders. I own a commercial cabinet shop and have 5 or 6 of these on hand at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good as described, this sander replaces a Porter/Cable that replacement parts are no longer in stock.
customer_reviews.author: VERIFIED CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Great Sander!
customer_reviews.text: A great high performance belt sander. The balance and weight of this unit really assists in the tool doing the work for you. I also really appreciate the power on lock feature that saves your hands on big jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised! Prompt delivery; excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to operate. Does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: 11B40PX2S

customer_reviews.title: Get the best, get Porter-Cable.
customer_reviews.text: I buy Porter-Cable because I want the best, and I believe they deliver. I have skill saws and 4 other sanders, which are all Porter-Cable, my electric screwdriver is Porter-Cable. My family knows when they purchase me tools that I want Porter-Cable. Am I prejudiced, damn straight, I want Porter-Cable!
customer_reviews.author: avconkle

customer_reviews.title: Belt Sander
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the belt sander. It was shipped very quickly. It was just like the one that I had previously owned. Hopefully it lasts as long as the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the quality we were expecting...
customer_reviews.text: Sander itself is just fine. the dust bag is pretty cheap though. The last one we had had a more rugged bag attachment.. we'll see how long this lasts (we build furniture so it needs to stand up to years of heavy use)
customer_reviews.author: kitty Hosch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Won't hold belt. Porter Cable Customer Service useless. Completely unusable tool. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Horsch

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: The sander recieved is the axact tool described, received in a brand new condition. The delivery had been done fast with no complication at all.
customer_reviews.author: tooluser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting a heavy powerful machine this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: sander
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product it was listed as new , I have a feeling that it is refurbished .... The first day I tried it and everytime since , it has shocked me !!! ??? Go figure ??? All I have used it for is with wood . Its shock is like static electricity only a lil stronger !??? Other than that it's a great tool ! OHHH , one other thing it didn't come with a dust collection bag . Had to call manufacture to get one !!!
customer_reviews.author: MAL

customer_reviews.title: Bag is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Has nice power. However the bag to the sander is very poor. Does not much dust before collapsing. Disappointed with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE 362V 4-Inch by 24-Inch Variable Speed Belt Sander
product_meta.description:
The Porter-Cable 4-Inch by 24-Inch Variable-Speed Belt Sander offers a powerful 12 amp motor and an all-metal design for durability and powerful handling. Ideal for both professionals, this heavy-duty sander boasts a large capacity, swiveling dust collection bag, a belt-tracking knob for quick-and-easy belt adjustments, and a variable speed dial for selecting speeds from 1,000 to 1,500 sfpm.

AMAZON.COM
The Porter-Cable 4-Inch by 24-Inch Variable-Speed Belt Sander offers a powerful 12 amp motor and an all-metal design for durability and powerful handling. Ideal for both professionals, this heavy-duty sander boasts a large capacity, swiveling dust collection bag, a belt-tracking knob for quick-and-easy belt adjustments, and a variable speed dial for selecting speeds from 1,000 to 1,500 sfpm.



12 Amp Motor for 20 Percent More Power
The belt sander packs a powerful punch thanks to its 12 amp motor that provides more power than other Porter Cable sanders. Located directly over the platen for perfect balance, the motor gives you optimum control as you tackle large woodworking projects. For a steady flow of speed while you work, the efficient belt-and-gear system smoothly transfers power from the motor to the sanding belt.Variable-Speed Dial, Belt Change Lever, and Belt-Tracking Knob
Enjoy precise sanding thanks to the variable-speed dial, which is conveniently placed on the rear of the handle, allowing for fast belt speed adjustments from 1,000 to 1,500 sfpm. Minimize down-time with the quick-release belt change lever and fingertip belt-tracking knob to dial in belt alignment over the rollers.

Ergonomic Design and Large Dust-Collection Bag
In addition to its advanced features, this belt sander is very user-friendly for a large, powerful sanding tool. Ergonomically correct handles keep you working comfortably, even during extended jobs. For further convenience, a large-capacity dust-collection bag swivels a full 360 degrees, so it's never in the way.

Dimensions and Warranty Information
At 15 and a half pounds, the 362V belt sander is the premier heavy-duty for professional users. It measures 14 inches high.

The 362V Variable-Speed Belt Sander is backed by a three-year warranty.

What's in the Box
Variable-speed belt sander, 100-grit zirconium black belt, dust-bag assembly, and operating manual.
feature_bullets: owerful 12.0 amp motor provides professional power
Motor is located over platen for maximum performance and perfect balance
Designed for flush sanding up to vertical surfaces
Variable-speed dial is conveniently placed on the handle
allows belt speed adjustment from 1,000 to 1,500 SFPM

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
